mapper.sql: MENU_ID AS menuId, PARENT_ID AS parentId, MENU_NAME AS menuName, URL AS url, PERMS AS perms, ICON AS icon, TYPE AS type, ORDER_NUM AS orderNum, CREATE_TIME AS createTime, MODIFY_TIME AS modifyTime
mapper.select: SELECT m.permission FROM t_role r LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON (r.role_id = ur.role_id) LEFT JOIN t_user u ON (u.user_id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN t_role_menu rm ON (rm.role_id = r.role_id) LEFT JOIN t_menu m ON (m.menu_id = rm.menu_id) WHERE u.username = #{username} AND m.permission is not null AND m.permission <> ''
